name: Dear Rapunzel
description:
Dear Rapunzel is game adaptation of the famous Rapunzel story. We tried to create mobile game on the cooperation basis, where one player acts like Rapunzel and the second one is trying to reach the top of the Tower. We are game designers duo, but we decided to use our undeveloped skills like coding and graphics to learn a bit more. So let´s safe the Rapunzel together.

by Šimon Borš & Martin Žofaj
